text: Egh kɨ Solomonɨn otarim ateghtɨ, a Israelian anabar vamɨran ganam. Eghtɨ nan ingangarir gumazim Devitɨn lam mungueghan kogham.11:36 2 Samuel 21:17ɨn, gumazir maba ghaze, Devit mati lam, angazangarim Israelia ganɨdi. Gɨn akar kam, Devitɨn lam, a Devitɨn adarazir akar isɨn zuimɨn mɨn oto. Akar kam, “Devitɨn lam mungan kogham,” an mɨngarim kamaghɨn, “Devitɨn ikɨzim gɨvan markɨ.” Bar puvatɨgham. An ovavir boriba atrivibar ikɨ mangɨvɨra ikiam. Devitɨn ikɨzimɨn adarazir tongɨn gumazitam zurara Jerusalemɨn atrivimɨn ikiam. Nguibar ekiar kam, gumazamiziba an izɨva nan boroghɨn izɨ nan ziam fasa kɨ a ginaba.
